articles.content:
A rapper whose music appeared on Coronation Street and Radio 1 has admitted sexually abusing a toddler.

articles.title: Careful Kate! Duchess of Cambridge warned Camilla making clear she will be Queen first - Daily Express
articles.description: KATE, the Duchess of Cambridge has been urged to 'watch out' as Camilla, the Duchess of Cornwall takes the necessary steps to prepare for her future role as the wife of a king.
